active_incidents.title: A very small number of users are having trouble sending messages

notes.body: No additional news to share just yet, but we're focused on getting things back to normal as quickly as we can. We apologize for the continued trouble.
We have determined this issue may only be impacting a small number of users and are working on a fix. We appreciate you bearing with us.
We are still actively investigating this issue and don't have any new information to share at this time. Thank you for your patience as we continue to work towards a fix.

Some users may be experiencing an error message when trying to send messages. We're working hard to resolve this issue as quickly as possible, and we'll share updates as soon as we can. We apologize for any inconvenience this may be causing.
